author: Simon Difford
description: Forget sipping warm java through a cold head of cream. This 'Martini' version of the classic Irish Coffee offers all the flavour without the moustache.
name: Irish Coffee 'Martini'
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
